hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #6# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Forest Temple#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that quest guidance can be found at a talking rock.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Milk Bottle#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Bottom

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Deku Tree Compass# and #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Goron Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Slingshot#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #3# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Forest Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest
